title: Stockholm Cinema Deal
description: Experience the latest movies in top cinemas across Sweden. Enjoy a wide selection of international blockbusters and local Swedish films in a comfortable, modern setting.
note:
Valid for one-time entry. Available in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, and more.
ℹ️ Please note that if your visit requires travel (e.g. a bus ticket or overnight stay), the total cost may be higher than the listed ticket price.

title: Gothenburg Culture Trip
description: Gothenburg, Sweden’s cultural hub, blends history and modern creativity. Explore its art scene at the Gothenburg Museum of Art, catch a show at the opera, or stroll through the charming Haga district. With vibrant music, cozy cafés, and beautiful coastal views, it’s a perfect spot for culture lovers.
note:
Valid for one-time entry. Includes museum access and guided walk.
ℹ️ Please note that if your visit requires travel (e.g. a bus ticket or overnight stay), the total cost may be higher than the listed ticket price.

title: Jonkoping Cinema Deal
description: Jönköping, a charming city in Sweden, offers a delightful mix of cultural experiences, including its cinema scene. Enjoy the latest films at the cozy Bio Roxy or catch a special screening at Filmstaden Jönköping. With a variety of cinemas to choose from, movie lovers can relax and immerse themselves in the latest blockbusters or indie gems.
note:
Valid for one-time entry. Available in Stockholm, Gothenburg, Malmö, and more.
ℹ️ Please note that if your visit requires travel (e.g. a bus ticket or overnight stay), the total cost may be higher than the listed ticket price.

title: Malmo Culture Trip
description: Malmö, a vibrant Swedish city, offers a mix of modern art, rich history, and diverse culture. Explore the Malmö Art Museum, stroll through the charming Gamla Staden (Old Town), or visit the impressive Turning Torso skyscraper. With a lively food scene, trendy galleries, and multicultural influences, Malmö is perfect for a cultural getaway.
note:
Valid for one-time entry. Includes museum access and guided walk.
ℹ️ Please note that if your visit requires travel (e.g. a bus ticket or overnight stay), the total cost may be higher than the listed ticket price.

title: Uppsala Culture Trip
description: Uppsala, a historic Swedish city, is rich in culture and charm. Visit the iconic Uppsala Cathedral, explore the Gustavianum museum, or stroll through the beautiful botanical gardens. As a university town, it’s filled with lively cafés, historic buildings, and vibrant arts. With its blend of tradition and modernity, Uppsala offers a unique cultural experience.
note:
Valid for one-time entry. Includes museum access and guided walk.
ℹ️ Please note that if your visit requires travel (e.g. a bus ticket or overnight stay), the total cost may be higher than the listed ticket price.
